messages.content: Do you offer free shipping?

[Document(metadata={'service_category': 'faqs', 'source': 'faqs.txt'}, page_content='IV. DELIVERY

Q: How can I track the processing status of my order at IVY Moda?
A: You can check your order status by visiting the "Order Management" section.

Q: How can I receive my order faster?
A: Delivery typically takes 3-5 business days.

Q: Do you offer free shipping?
A: Free shipping is available on orders over 1 million VND.

V. RETURN AND WARRANTY')]
Absolutely! üéâ IVY Moda offers free shipping on orders over 1 million VND. üöö‚ú® If you have any other questions or need further assistance, just let us know! üí¨üòä

function.name: save_memory
function.description: Use this tool to save memories like user information to storage

function.name: lookup_documents
function.description:
Retrieve shop documents for queries about store services like policies, FAQs, or categories. Use for intent `service`.

Categories:
- faqs: General queries like "How to cancel an order."
- policies: Detailed policy inquiries like "What is your refund policy?"

Example:
- Query: "What are your policies?" ‚Üí Category: [policies]

Use only when `intent = service`.

function.name: sql_db_schema
function.description: Get the schema and sample rows for the specified SQL tables.Use after verifying table names.Prerequisite: Call sql_db_list_tables first if tables are unknown.

table_names.description: A comma-separated list of the table names for which to return the schema. Example input: 'table1, table2, table3'

function.name: sql_db_list_tables
function.description:
Get database table names
Input is an empty string, output is a comma-separated list of tables in the database. Call this only if table names are unknown.

function.name: check_and_execute_query_tool
function.description:
Validate and execute SQL queries.

Requirements:
- Prior calls to sql_db_list_tables and sql_db_schema.
- Ensure SQL syntax correctness.

Example query: "SELECT * FROM Product WHERE name LIKE '%cotton%';"

Returns: Query result or error for retry.

messages.content: Give me list categories.

[Document(metadata={'service_category': 'faqs', 'source': 'faqs.txt'}, page_content='I. GENERAL INFORMATION
Q: What are categories?
A: Here are categories: "Shirts", "T-Shirts", "Sweaters", "Coats", "Jackets", "Pants", "Shorts", "Dresses"

II. ACCOUNT

Q: How can I change or update the phone number linked to my IVY Moda account?
A: Please send an email to CSKH@ivy.com.vn to request a phone number change. Each account is allowed a maximum of 3 phone number changes.')]

We have a stylish variety for you! üëó Here are our categories:
- Shirts
- T-Shirts
- Sweaters
- Coats
- Jackets
- Pants
- Shorts
- Dresses
Let us know if you need further assistance! üòä

messages.content: What is your refund policy?

[Document(metadata={'key': 'return_policy', 'service_category': 'policies', 'source': 'policies.yaml'}, page_content='- Returns are only allowed once according to the policy.

    - The return value of the product is calculated based on the unit price on the
    invoice.

    - IVY moda only issues "Deposit Receipts" to refund the excess after returns and
    the value of returned items; no cash refunds are allowed.

    - If the error is due to the manufacturer, IVY moda will bear the full cost of
    shipping for the return and exchange.


    4. EXCLUDED RETURN CASES')],[Document(metadata={'service_category': 'faqs', 'source': 'faqs.txt'}, page_content='Q: How long does it take to receive a refund?
A: IVY Moda will issue a receipt immediately for cases such as:
- Returns where no suitable exchange product is available.
- Overpayment due to duplicate charges (e.g., both online and on delivery).
- Products with manufacturing defects.
Refunds are processed within 10-15 days after receiving the request.')]

‚ú® Here‚Äôs our Refund Policy at IVY Moda Fashion Store:
- üîÑ Returns: Each order is allowed one return under our policy.
- üí∞ Refund Calculation: The refund amount is based on the unit price stated on the invoice.
- üßæ Deposit Receipts: Refunds are issued as Deposit Receipts only‚Äîcash refunds are not available.
- üöõ Manufacturer Errors: If the issue is due to a manufacturer error, IVY Moda will cover the full shipping cost for returns or exchanges.

**Additional Information:**
- ‚è≥ Refund Timing: Refunds are processed within 10‚Äì15 days after receiving the request for the following cases:
- üõçÔ∏è Returns where no suitable exchange product is available.
- üí≥ Overpayments (e.g., duplicate charges for online and delivery).
- üõ†Ô∏è Products with manufacturing defects.

üí° Need further assistance? Don‚Äôt hesitate to ask‚Äîwe‚Äôre here to help! üòä

messages.content: Can I refund my order?

[Document(metadata={'key': 'return_policy', 'service_category': 'policies', 'source': 'policies.yaml'}, page_content='- Returns are only allowed once according to the policy.

    - The return value of the product is calculated based on the unit price on the
    invoice.

    - IVY moda only issues "Deposit Receipts" to refund the excess after returns and
    the value of returned items; no cash refunds are allowed.

    - If the error is due to the manufacturer, IVY moda will bear the full cost of
    shipping for the return and exchange.


    4. EXCLUDED RETURN CASES'), Document(metadata={'service_category': 'faqs', 'source': 'faqs.txt'}, page_content='Q: How can I cancel my order?
A: Log in to the "Order Management" section, select the order you want to cancel, and click "Cancel Order."
- For prepaid orders, please contact the IVY Moda hotline at 02466623434 (extension 3) for support between 8:00 AM - 5:30 PM, Monday to Friday.
- For orders already in transit, you cannot cancel via the website. Instead, refuse the delivery when it arrives.

III. ORDER & PAYMENT')]

Absolutely! Here‚Äôs the refund policy for IVY Moda Fashion Store:

**üïí Return Period**
- Returns are accepted within 15 days from the date you receive the items.
**üìç Return Locations**
- You can return items at any IVY Moda store or through our Online Warehouse system.
**üì¶ Return Conditions**
- üè∑Ô∏è Items must still have the original tags and barcodes.
- ‚ùå Items must be unused and include the original invoice.
- üëï This applies to products made of cotton, wool, cotton-wool blends, and jeans.
**üí∏ Refund Process**
- üîÑ One-Time Return: Returns are allowed only once per policy.
- üí∞ Refund Value: Calculated based on the unit price on the invoice.
- üßæ Deposit Receipts Only: Refunds are issued as Deposit Receipts‚Äîcash refunds are not available.
- üöõ Manufacturer Errors: If the issue is due to the manufacturer, IVY Moda will cover the full shipping cost for the return and exchange.

üí° Need help or have more questions? Feel free to ask‚Äîwe‚Äôre always here for you! üòä

messages.content: Give me product "Serge Checkered Wide-Leg Pants"
Category, Product

CREATE TABLE "Product" (
	id INTEGER NOT NULL, 
	name VARCHAR NOT NULL, 
	description VARCHAR, 
	price FLOAT NOT NULL, 
	out_of_stock BOOLEAN, 
	category_id INTEGER NOT NULL, 
	images VARCHAR, 
	url VARCHAR, 
	PRIMARY KEY (id), 
	FOREIGN KEY(category_id) REFERENCES "Category" (id)
)

[(13, 'Serge Checkered Wide-Leg Pants', 'These modern trousers blend youthful fashion style with the sophistication of the office environment. The high-waisted design combined with wide legs enhances the figure while offering comfort to the wearer.
